Code

Website Structure

Create basic directory structure
Install Quarto
Create _quarto.yml configuration file
Create homepage (index.qmd)
Create About page
Create blog section with category pages
Create projects section

Blog System

Set up category/tag system with filterable posts
Create sample blog posts for each category
Implement interactive elements (R visualizations, code toggles)
Set up search functionality
Configure RSS feed generation
Implement comments/feedback system

SEO Optimization

Create meta-tags.html with schema markup
Set up automatic sitemap.xml generation
Configure canonical URL management
Create guidelines for alt-text optimization

Technical Implementation

Set up GitHub Pages deployment configuration
Optimize for fast load times
Implement accessibility features (WCAG 2.1)
Add social media sharing integrations
Set up analytics integration

Content Strategy

Create blog post template with standardized front matter
Set up automatic date-based organization
Implement related posts suggestions
Create author bio schema
Add newsletter subscription functionality

Interactivity

Set up live R code execution examples
Create interactive chart examples (Plotly/Leaflet)
Implement dynamic tables with filtering
Add progressive disclosure for technical content

Deliverables

Complete Quarto project structure
Deployment pipeline configuration
SEO-optimized blog templates
Documentation for content updates
Performance optimization checklist

title: About Me
text:
I am an actuary and data scientist with expertise in risk modeling, statistical analysis, and data visualization. My work focuses on applying advanced analytical techniques to solve complex problems in insurance, finance, and related fields.
With a background in actuarial science and a passion for data-driven decision making, I bring a unique perspective to projects that require both domain knowledge and technical expertise.

title: About Me
text:
I am an actuary and data scientist with expertise in risk modeling, statistical analysis, and data visualization. My work focuses on applying advanced analytical techniques to solve complex problems in insurance, finance, and related fields.
With a background in actuarial science and a passion for data-driven decision making, I bring a unique perspective to projects that require both domain knowledge and technical expertise.

title: About Me
text:
Education & Certifications

Master of Science in Actuarial Science
University Name, Year
Bachelor of Science in Mathematics
University Name, Year
Professional Certifications

Associate of the Society of Actuaries (ASA)
Chartered Enterprise Risk Analyst (CERA)
Certified Data Scientist

title: About Me
text:
Technical Skills
My technical toolkit includes:

Programming Languages: R, Python, SQL
Statistical Methods: Regression analysis, time series forecasting, survival analysis
Machine Learning: Supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning
Data Visualization: ggplot2, Plotly, Shiny
Actuarial Software: Prophet, AXIS, MoSes
Version Control: Git, GitHub

title: About Me
text:
Research Interests
My research interests lie at the intersection of actuarial science and data science:

Applying machine learning to enhance traditional actuarial models
Developing predictive models for mortality and longevity risk
Exploring innovative approaches to insurance pricing and reserving
Creating interactive tools for risk visualization and communication

title: About Me
text:
Professional Philosophy
I believe in the power of data to transform decision-making processes and drive innovation. My approach combines rigorous statistical methodology with practical business insights to deliver solutions that are both technically sound and actionable.
I am committed to sharing knowledge and contributing to the advancement of both actuarial science and data science through research, teaching, and community engagement.

title: About Me
text:
Contact Me
Iâ€™m always interested in collaborating on interesting projects or discussing ideas related to actuarial science and data analytics. Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on LinkedIn.
